---
title: Agent Mode
description: Bootstrap automations from natural language prompts
---

<iframe
  className="w-full aspect-video rounded-xl"
  src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6qyPN6vpogc"
  title="Notte Agent Mode"
  allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"

Agent Mode is a simple way to bootstrap an automation from scratch. Prompt a browser agent in natural language, let it execute the task step by step, then automatically convert its execution into editable code. Open it in Automation Studio and iterate from there.

<Card title="Build now" icon="arrow-up-right-from-square" href="https://console.notte.cc">
  Open the Console to start building with Agent Mode.
</Card>
